author: Staff Reporter
text:
Nine persons were booked by the Madurai district police on Friday under Protection of Children from Sexual Offences (POCSO) Act for alleged harassment of a 15-year-old school girl.

According to a complaint filed by the girl’s mother from a village near Usilampatti, the girl, studying Class 10 in a private school, was repeatedly harassed by a group of youngsters to accept the proposal of one the group members, who was apparently in love with her. A week ago, the gang allegedly intercepted the girl while she was on her way to school and harassed her again by pulling her school bag. The complainant alleged that when she went to question the gang, they abused her verbally and threatened to attack her and the girl with acid.

A case has been registered at the Usilampatti Town police station under Section 12 of the POCSO Act, which deals with sexual harassment of a child, and also other sections of IPC and Tamil Nadu Prohibition of Harassment of Women Act. The list of accused included women, who are family members of one of the youths, police said.
title: Nine booked under POCSO Act
